creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: pine tree highlighted with light brown and green pigment rising from R; irregular vertical rock at LR, near tree trunk, formed from horizontal dashes with paintbrush and highlighted with brown pigment; diagonal brushstrokes and light green watercolor along bottom; short inscription ULQ
marks:
Signature, Inscription, and Seal

ULQ UL edge
medium: Ink and light colors on paper
title: Pine, Rock, and Poem
